name: Wisp (PKGames)
description:
Hello and Welcome!

This game is a casual relaxing game. With beautiful visuals and calming music. Try to reach the maximum score in 3 minutes. Don't worry, you cannot die. Just relax and have fun!

You play as a blue wisp and must avoid the red ones to reach the other side. Your wisp follows the mouse pointer. Touch the other wisps to destroy them. You can hold the left mouse button to increase your speed but will cost score. If the other wisps reach the other side, you lose score.

Right mouse button to pause the game.

The sprites were made by Free Game Assets (https://free-game-assets.itch.io/).

The music was made by Tallbeard Studios (https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle).

Have fun playing this game.
